name: Minesweeper+ (ddeeddii)
description:
Minesweeper too boring? Try Minesweeper+ with 4 new awesome tiles and 4 new useful items that'll help you on your quest to sweep the mines!

New Tiles:

  • Exploded Tile: Acts like an uncovered, empty tile
  • Radar Tile: Shows a random bomb's location
  • Detonator Tile: Detonates a random bomb, creating exploded tiles
  • Chest Tile: Grants one random item

New Items:

  • Metal Detector: Tells you if a bomb is on the selected tile
  • Dynamite: Explodes tiles around the selected tile
  • Pickaxe: Destroys the selected tile
  • Shield: Protects you from one bomb explosion

Credits:

  • Sounds created using sfxr
  • Victory jingle taken from here
  • Background art taken from Terraria
  • Used UI font is Silkscreen, used tile font is Pixel Operator
